allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Vercel deployment build errors

- Add lib/db.ts with Prisma client export for 19 dependent files
- Add components/ui/alert-dialog.tsx for family-member-linker and payment-methods
- Fix email templates: change $var to {var} to prevent build-time evaluation
- Fix Stripe service: use lazy initialization to avoid missing API key during build
- Change reminders cron from every 15 min to daily \(Vercel Hobby plan limit\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Connect admin pages to real database with Prisma

- Update /api/v1/patients route to use Prisma for CRUD operations
- Update /api/v1/users route to use Prisma for CRUD operations
- Create admin patients page with real data fetching
- Update admin users page with real data fetching
- Add loading states, error handling, and form validation
- Add table and collapsible UI components

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix patient profile page to use real API instead of mock data

- Remove hardcoded mock data
- Fetch profile from /api/v1/patients/me on mount
- Save changes via PUT request to the API
- Add loading state while fetching
- Handle empty/missing data gracefully

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Convert main dashboards from mock data to real API calls

- Add /api/v1/dashboard/stats endpoint for real-time statistics
- Update Admin Dashboard to fetch real user, driver, trip, and revenue data
- Update Dispatcher Dashboard to fetch real trips and driver data
- Update Patient Dashboard to fetch real profile, trips, and standing orders
- All dashboards now show loading states and handle empty data gracefully

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
